A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing. I saw A New Hope in the theater in 1978. I remember the feeling of gravitas and depth of purpose in that original film. They've never come close since Empire. And this was as far from sincere as it gets. Alternating between cheap pandering and outright contempt for original fans is no way to write a story. I've seen every other sequel more than once. This is my first and last time for The Last Jedi.
